conclusion: Need to analyze v-t graph and calculate distance traveled by each car up to t = 10 seconds.
Graph shows velocity of Cars A and B over time; Car A has constant velocity of 40 m/s from t = 0 to t = 30 seconds; Car B starts from rest and accelerates linearly, reaching 40 m/s at t = 20 seconds.
Car A travels at a constant velocity of 40 m/s.
Distance traveled by Car A from t = 0 to t = 10 seconds is 400 m.
Car B accelerates uniformly from 0 to 40 m/s over 20 seconds.
Velocity-time graph for Car B is a straight line from 0 to 40 m/s.
Area under the graph from t = 0 to t = 10 seconds represents the distance traveled by Car B.
Distance traveled by Car B from t = 0 to t = 10 seconds is 100 m.
At t = 10 seconds, Car A has traveled 400 meters and Car B has traveled 100 meters.
Car A is ahead of Car B at t = 10 seconds.
